Controller: CYP2A6, CYP2B6, CYP2C19, CYP2C8, CYP2C9, CYP3A4, CYP3A5
Summary: Biochemical reaction from cyclophosphamide to 4-hydroxycyclophosphamide. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C9, CYP2A6, CYP3A4, CYP2B6, CYP3A5, CYP2C8 or CYP2C19.
Biochemical reaction from cyclophosphamide to 3-dechloroethyl ifosfamide, chloroacetaldehyde. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2B6, CYP3A5 or CYP3A4.
